newsitem.title: UK: Portuguese fuel tender deliveries to run into Nov.
newsitem.headline: Portuguese fuel tender deliveries to run into Nov.

text.p: Portugal's state power company Electridade de Portugal (EdP) has tendered to buy up to 150,000 tonnes of high sulphur fuel oil for delivery in September, October and November.
The tender consists of six cargoes, including two optionals, of 25,000 tonnes apiece. The optional cargoes are for delivery into Lisbon, the others for delivery into Setubal.
The optional cargoes have delivery dates of Oct 27-29 and Nov 8-10, while the firm cargoes are for Sept 16-30, Oct 14-18, Oct 22-26 and Oct 27-30.
Traders said the tender is likely to close on Friday and be awarded on Monday, but this was not confirmed.
